name: Grick Alpha
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
descriptions: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
